review: The rooms are not clean. Since there is frequent problem of electricity back plan is not available. Difficult to get hot water. Though the staff was good and co operative. They are helping but due to  limitation of facility in the hotel it was not a pleasant stay. However due to location of this area it may difficult to find the good hotel like in another city. So it is still not worst to stay for char dham yatra.
name: harshsuru
